      • handleSocketException

        public HTTPMessage<HTTPResponseStartLine> handleSocketException(FailedToCreateServerSocketException socketException)
        Handles exceptions during Socket connection. The returned HTTP 500 notifies of the host and port configuration supplied in the Config
        Parameters:
        socketException - Exception thrown during Socket connection
        Returns:
        StandardResponses._500(java.lang.String)

      • handleSocketStreamReadException

        public HTTPMessage<HTTPResponseStartLine> handleSocketStreamReadException(SocketStreamReadError streamReadError)
        Handles exceptions thrown whilst reading from an open InputStream for a Socket. The returned HTTP 500 notifies of the error message of the thrown SocketStreamReadError exception.
        Parameters:
        streamReadError - Exception thrown while reading from a Socket's InputStream
        Returns:
        StandardResponses._500(java.lang.String)

      • handleHTTPException

        public HTTPMessage<HTTPResponseStartLine> handleHTTPException(HTTPMessageException messageException)
        Handles exceptions thrown while parsing a HTTPMessage. The returned HTTP 500 notifies of the error message of the thrown HTTPMessageException.
        Parameters:
        messageException - Exception thrown while parsing a HTTPMessage
        Returns:
        StandardResponses._500(java.lang.String)
